infos.value: Phew... What a sobering battle.
By the way...
Why have you come here?
For the same reason as all the others.
Hmm. So you also wish to become a samurai of the east...?
Perhaps she thinks these lands a haven for drifters.
Rabble from the mainland are under the illusion that they can just waltz into our home and start afresh...
Do not jest! I am not the same as the others. I...
Then why not just call yourself a samurai?
What...?
There are countless samurai on the mainland who do not hail from "the east," are there not?
You mean to say they are a sham?
I didn’t say that. But alas...
I’m afraid you will not find a master to guide you here.
What shall we do, then? Send her on her way?
I refuse to leave. No matter what happens, I shall not go back.
Oh, my. It seems she’s made up her mind.
...Very well.
Sir Owe, you can’t mean...
I shall train her. Hah hah hah!
But Sir Owe, you must return to the mainland soon…
Not to worry. I doubt this will take very long.
...Oh? Heading to the mountain already?
What mountain?
The mountain of trials. A place where all aspiring samurai must go.
Do you object?
Do not be absurd, Sir Owe! If you take her there now, then surely she will...
Oh, my. Are you worried for her now?
N-no. I simply...
If I don’t, I fear she won’t give up. Hah hah hah!
So that is the only reason you've agreed to take me?
Unfortunately, I must disappoint you. I shall not abandon my cause.
A bold one, you are.
Then let us depart, shall we?
...Master.
Ah, right. We shall accompany you.
But why...?
Why else? It sounds like fun. A grand reason, is it not?
The samurai of the east certainly have a lot of time on their hands...
